sentences.en: A corrective for overacidity is an alkaline substance.
sentences.cn: 酸性过度的中和剂是碱性物质.

sentences.en: Antacids are alkaline and they relieve pain by neutralizing acid in the contents of the stomach.
sentences.cn: 抗酸剂是碱性的，通过中和胃容物中的酸来减轻疼痛。

sentences.en: Copper is also employed in the alkaline Bemberg rayon process.
sentences.cn: 铜也用在碱性本姆伯人造丝生产中.

sentences.en: Equalization involves mixing wastewater streams of acidic and alkaline nature in an equalization basin.
sentences.cn: 均衡即是在均衡池中将酸性和碱性废水混和.

sentences.en: Lipase acts only in an alkaline solution.
sentences.cn: 脂肪酶仅在碱溶液中才起作用.

sentences.en: Neutralization happens when an acid liquid is mixed with an alkaline liquid.
sentences.cn: 将酸性液体和碱性液体掺混起来会发生中和反应.

sentences.en: Porphyry rocks in this belt are intermediate - acid rocks of calc - alkaline series.
sentences.cn: 该斑岩带斑岩属钙?A性 系列、中 酸性岩 类.

sentences.en: Some soils are actually too alkaline for certain plant life.
sentences.cn: 有些土壤其实碱性过强，不利于某些植物生长。

sentences.en: The development of Methods: That involve moderately alkaline eluents should be encouraged.
sentences.cn: 应提倡温和碱性洗脱剂方法的探索.

sentences.en: These derivatives are readily obtained by alkylation of 2 - mercaptopyridine and alkyl halides under alkaline conditions.
sentences.cn: 这些衍生物可以容易地在碱性条件下通过 2- 巯基吡啶和卤代烷的烷基化而得到.

sentences.en: This plant prefers alkaline soil, though it will readily tolerate some acidity.
sentences.cn: 这种植物在酸性土壤中也能生存, 但碱性土壤更加适宜.

sentences.en: Various clinical manifestations reflect different forms of alkaline phosphatase gene expression.
sentences.cn: 不同型之临床表现与其碱性磷酸酶之基因缺失有关.

sentences.en: Waterlogged and alkaline areas were marked down for special attention.
sentences.cn: 易涝地区和碱地都被标了出来以便特别注意.

sentences.en: We try to revegetate the saline or alkaline lands near the seashore.
sentences.cn: 我们试图在海滨附近的盐碱地上重种植物.

words.tran_cn: [化学] 碱度；[化学] 碱性
